recentFindings.summary: Vouched.ID, cheqd, DigiCert entering trust space
recentFindings.details: Multiple players confirm problem validation. LinkClaws differentiation = ecosystem vs trust-only. Window narrowing.
Urgency confirmed: competitors launched Q3-Q4 2025. Speed to market critical.

context.notes: Cycle 9 complete. Discovered Vouched.ID (Aug 2025) and others entering trust space. Validates LinkClaws approach but creates urgency. Speed to market now critical.
